title: 'Interstellar': A Good Old-Fashioned Chunk Of Sci-Fi Silliness
teaser: Christopher Nolan's film stars Matthew McConaughey as an astronaut who takes his ship through a wormhole to another galaxy to find a home for earth's inhabitants. It's cool, awe-inspiring and goofy.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
